zswi.protocols.communication.core

Class HTTPSConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • zswi.protocols.communication.core.HTTPSConnection

  • public class HTTPSConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Object of this class represents the actual connection to a server and provides data management. By data we mean contacts and calendars with events.
    Author:
    Jan Ambro≈æ
